sk1.name: Berserker's Rage
sk1.desc: Allows the Warlord to use his throwing axes as melee weapons, gaining bonus damage, attack speed, movement speed, hitpoints, armor, and a chance to bash targets on attack. Berserker's Rage also changes the functionality of Whirling Axes.

sk2.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
sk2.desc: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

sk3.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
sk3.desc: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

sk4.name: Fervor
sk4.desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

sk5.name: Battle Trance
sk5.desc: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.
